      • Publication

        public Publication()

      • Publication

        public Publication(java.lang.String title,
                   int publicationYear,
                   int audienceSize,
                   java.lang.String summary,
                   java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> keywords,
                   java.util.ArrayList<Investigator> authors)
        Parameters:
        title - the publication's title.
        publicationYear - the publications year.
        audienceSize - the publications audience size.
        summary - a small text that summarizes the publication content.
        keywords - some words which have a key role in the publication.
        authors - the publication's author's.
